messages.content:
I just completed my survey. Ironic that the question they asked is what the one thing I would change about my favorite game. I said Overwatch and how I would change the matchmaking philosophy to promote friends to play together rather than discourage it (something that has been a growing problem with that game and became worse yesterday with the recent Global Play update).

I am hopeful that Palia is going to be a game where friends can truly have fun together without stressing out about having a fair game.
Matchmaking with friends for a heavily competitive game has always been a very difficult task to solve; glad to hear the feedback though!
